spike_guard.title: Spike Guard
spike_guard.summary: Spike Guard keeps you safe against unexpected expenses by capping your budget to an acceptable value.

channels.title: Channels
channels.summary: Enables distribution of your application to multiple user groups at once. Allows to keep unstable versions of your application away from the main line.

premium_support.title: Premium Support
premium_support.summary: We prioritize your issues and requests.  We guarantee a reaction time below 24 hours (usually1-4). Includes  Skype calls with screen sharing, code fixes, management tasks.

whitelabel.title: White-label
whitelabel.summary: Hides the PatchKit logo. Makes the launcher entirely yours.

lzma2.title: LZMA2 Compression
lzma2.summary: Enables strong LZMA2 compression algorithm reducing your build sizes up to 30%.

product_keys.title: License Keys
product_keys.summary: Limits access to your product by verifying product key before downloading your application.

custom_patcher.title: Custom Launcher
custom_patcher.summary: Allows you to download, customize in any way you need and upload a custom launcher for your applications.

collaborators.title: Account collaborators
collaborators.summary: Enables inviting collaborators to your account with designated roles.
